Analyzing OpenAPI spec for /_send_group_notice. Identified request body fields group_id (int|str, required), content (str, required), image (str, optional). Identified response body fields status (Literal['ok'], required), retcode (int, required), data (None, required), message (str, required), wording (str, required), echo (str|None, required). Corrected imports: removed logging, Any; added Literal. Updated SendGroupNoticeReq with correct fields, types, required status, and descriptions via Field. Updated SendGroupNoticeRes with correct fields, types, and descriptions via Field. Ensured adherence to Python 3.13 type hints and pydanticV2 practices. Removed type: ignore.
